DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine a safe and effective dose of ADX415 for the treatment of hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A Dose-Ranging Study of the Safety and Efficacy of ADX415 in the Treatment of Essential Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Mild to moderate hypertension Age 1875 years, inclusive Clinically significant illnesses or abnormalities upon evaluation Current treatment with 3 or more antihypertensive meds Presence of Type I or uncontrolled Type II diabetes Presence of alcohol or drug abuse
